title: Atom
description: I was responsible for the creation of integration modules and reports of telecommunication devices, this helped internal workers to perform remote configurations and resolve incidents easily and quickly. In addition to interactive dashboards that showed data in real time.

title: WARE
technologies: Node | EJS | jQuery | MongoDB | Bootstrap | Vis.js
description: This dashboard uses, creates, and edits telecom project templates, typically used for installations, service delivery, additions, and equipment replacement. It has a module that simulates various telecommunication devices and their connections, it also includes useful modules to configure customized services that customers require.

title: Entregalo
description: A courier administration website that is responsible for assigning orders and packages, providing services to various supplier and delivery companies. I am responsible for the creation of claims modules, automatic assignment of couriers according to the area of origin and destination, modular improvements and optimization in the backend, and visuals in the frontend.
